com.ibasco.agql.core

Class AbstractMessenger<A extends AbstractRequest,B extends AbstractResponse>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibasco.agql.core.AbstractMessenger<A,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - AbstractRequest
    B - AbstractResponse
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Messenger<A,B>, Closeable, AutoCloseable, BiConsumer<B,Throwable>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameServerMessenger

    public abstract class AbstractMessenger<A extends AbstractRequest,B extends AbstractResponse>
extends Object
implements Messenger<A,B>

    The base implementation of the Messenger interface. Contains an internal queue for the requests and process them based on priority
